description: This file defines the IDispatcher interface and its nested ICallback interface within the WPEFramework plugin hosting namespace. It declares virtual methods related to event handling, invocation, validation, and other dispatcher functionalities, serving as an abstract interface for dispatching mechanisms.

classes.name: IDispatcher
classes.description: An interface for dispatching commands, events, and managing callbacks within the plugin host framework.

classes.name: IDispatcher::ICallback
classes.description: A callback interface for handling events, errors, and responses from the dispatcher.

methods.name: Validate
methods.description: Validates a token with a method and parameters.

methods.name: Invoke
methods.description: Invokes a method using a callback, with specified parameters, and returns a response.

methods.name: Revoke
methods.description: Revokes or unregisters a callback from the dispatcher.

methods.name: Local
methods.description: Accesses the local dispatcher for inline activation or management.

calls: Core::hresult Event(const string& event, const string& parameters)
Core::hresult Error(const uint32_t channel, const uint32_t id, const uint32_t code, const string& message)
Core::hresult Response(const uint32_t channel, const uint32_t id, const string& response)
Core::hresult Subscribe(const uint32_t channel, const string& event, const string& designator)
Core::hresult Unsubscribe(const uint32_t channel, const string& event, const string& designator)
Core::hresult Validate(const string& token, const string& method, const string& paramaters)
Core::hresult Invoke(ICallback* callback, const uint32_t channelId, const uint32_t id, const string& token, const string& method, const string& parameters, string& response)

ctags.name: ICallback
ctags.pattern: /^            struct EXTERNAL ICallback : public virtual Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IDispatcher
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IDispatcher : public virtual Core::IUnknown {$/
